headline: Why The Narrative Around Ulta Beauty Is Shifting After Fresh Earnings Beats And Growth Moves
summary: Ulta Beauty's intrinsic value has been nudged higher, with the fair value estimate climbing from about $575 per share to roughly $603 as analysts grow more confident in the retailer's ability to sustain its earnings edge. Slightly stronger long term revenue growth assumptions, supported by the Space NK acquisition and ongoing demand resilience, are enough to justify this modest upgrade even as a higher discount rate signals a bit more perceived risk. Keep reading to see how you can stay on...
